rules_text:
Vigilance, first strike
[i]Search for Items – [/i][i][/i]When Harry enters, look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal up to two artifact cards from among them and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. If you didn’t put two cards into your hand this way, investigate twice.
You may activate equip abilities any time you could cast an instant.
